user.title: Area Setup
user.description: Set up the area name and required motion sensors

data_description.name: Name for this area (e.g., Living Room, Office)
data_description.motion_sensors: Select motion sensors that detect occupancy in this area

devices.title: Connected Devices
devices.description: Configure media devices and appliances that indicate room usage

data_description.media_devices: Media players that indicate room usage (e.g., TVs, speakers)
data_description.appliances: Devices whose power state indicates activity (e.g., computers, game consoles)

environmental.title: Environmental Sensors
environmental.description: Configure optional environmental sensors for improved detection

data_description.illuminance_sensors: Sensors that detect light level changes
data_description.humidity_sensors: Sensors that detect humidity changes from activity
data_description.temperature_sensors: Sensors that detect temperature changes from occupancy

data_description.threshold: Probability threshold to consider area occupied (0-1)
data_description.history_period: Days of historical data to analyze (1-30)
data_description.decay_enabled: Gradually reduce sensor influence over time
data_description.decay_window: Time before sensor readings fully decay
data_description.decay_type: How sensor influence decreases over time

error.invalid_decay: Decay window must be between 60 and 3600 seconds
